website_summaries.verdict: This calendar is ideal for larger families because it contains 8 ounces of quality chocolate to share.
pros: Generous supply of milk chocolate pieces
Graphics are nostalgic, great for table display
Wide array of foil-wrapped pieces, from old-fashioned to contemporary
cons: Some consumer complaints about outdated or poor quality chocolate
Pieces can slide out of windows

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra dough, these are the best
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never buy a different calendar ever again. These are the Mercedes Benz of advent calendars. Seriously, how many times has your eager, doe eyed, red faced child popped a day open only to be freaked out by a chalky tiny lump of former chocolate? How many times has have you had to hold all the little flaps closed and shake it upside down, hoping all the candy would return to its little indentations before your kid thinks you were just playing a cruel joke on them. Never again. These little individually wrapped chunks of edible magic will not let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Boynton

customer_reviews.title: Very good chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually post a review but on this item I just had to. This advent calendar is really the best one I have ever had. The box is cute and on each date there is a cute poem. The chocolates are the best I've ever seen in a calendar. Really nice!! Very good chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Lw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The calendar and chocolates came in good condition. Best chocolate advent calendar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CKD1979

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We are giving one star because the item arrived on time. That being said, the quality was very poor, especially for the price! The container is not secure at the ends, so the tray slides out nonstop. The chocolates were mixed up all over, which lessens the positive interaction for children - disappointing. Due to the chocolates being dumped all over inside, the "windows" were opened before we got to open them. We would not invest in this product again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: All the chocolate so stale it is beige and dusty!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different designs for our twin boys this year. For both boxes, every chocolate is so stale they are BEIGE! I think it is called "fat bloom" that happens when chocolate gets really old. At first I thought they were caramels from the look of them. It wasn't until one of the boys said "Mommy, this chocolate tastes kind of weird" that I realized it really was milk chocolare! Neither box has an expiration or packaging date on them, but NO WAY are they fresh. Both boxes are going into the garbage. Horrible. You should refund everyone's money for selling food past it's obvious expiration!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No variety in taste or presentation. Blah!
customer_reviews.text: Fair advent calendar. More like a countdown to Christmas without anything Advent-related. The chocolates were all the same, just in a few different wraps. My child got used to the blah presentation of the same-looking and tasting chocolates each day. Sometimes, he’d open the window for the chocolate and just leave the chocolate present in there. He’d look excited to see what each day would bring in this calendar, but was disappointed with the monotony of the same old thing. He said the chocolates were good. I tried them, but I would say they were a very low-end chocolate with a blah taste.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Product would be really good if shipping did not warp it.
customer_reviews.text: Cons Package dented from shipping in soft package. Cannot unwarp the dents. Some of the doors opened because of denting/warping. Cannot stand-up alone, have to lean it against something or lay flat. Pros Numbers on the doors are really small but kinda makes it fun for kids to find. Kids reading the notes inside each door. Kids really like the milk chocolate. All the chocolates are the same: square blocks of milk chocolate. Product exactly as pictured. Received two.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is sooooo cute!! They were already out of calendars at Trader Joe's this year, on only the 1st day of December. Was bummed so I searched Amazon for one to arrive quickly via Prime. Came across this gem. The little messages behind each door are so cute! Each chocolate is individually wrapped in different colored "wrapping paper", and I have to say - the chocolates are AMAZING!! Silky and delicious. We've found our new yearly advent calendar, 100%!!!!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Verde

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, delicious, fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was December 4th, our usual Advent calendar sold out. Others way over priced (not to mention ugly)! I came across Madelaine! We purchased, they were delivered promptly. The chocolates are solid, festively wrapped, cute thoughtful sayings on each window. My grandkids are so happy, which floats my boat too! Thanks Madelaine for keeping it fun and real$$
customer_reviews.author: W B

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar with good sized chocolates
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the chocolates yummy, but they are also a good size and wrapped to look like gifts. The art on the calendar is pretty (though I wish there were more options for images this year). My only quibble was with the packaging - one of the calendars came in a padded envelope which wasn't quite enough protection and the calendar was dented.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parlakian

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully wrapped and excellent chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased more expensive advent calendars but my children love this one the best! Each chocolate comes beautifully wrapped along with a sweet quote inside the flap. The flavor is excellent! I will only purchase this brand next year. Wish I had known what an awesome product this was last year! Don’t pass this one up!
customer_reviews.author: Cyncyn

customer_reviews.title: Meh, just meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a snob about chocolate, well, yes I am. It's milk chocolate and while it is good quality, it's not very chocolaty. (Normal milk chocolate can have as little as 10% cacao percentage.) and expensive for what it is. I bought this as an Advent calendar, to keep the kids from tearing up the house looking for their Christmas stuff, It didn't work, they knew what they were getting well before the 25th.
customer_reviews.author: David Bell

customer_reviews.title: Daughter enjoyed. Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I buy chocolate advent calendars every year. This one is better than what is usually available at the local store. Reasonably priced. Chocolate is good, but not great. Each chocolate is the same from one day to the next except for the color of the foil. I wish the calendar was made a little better. Multiple “windows” open easily when just trying to open one...a little awkward. Open “windows” keep closing and sticking in the box, and the calendar opens at the top. Overall, my daughter enjoyed it. Next year I will spend a bit more and buy either a Lindt or Cadbury calendar.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: The art work appealed to me and the chocolate was actually pretty good. We didn't have any problems with the chocolates falling out of place. The poems were pretty bad but in an endearing way and my husband and I had fun giving them a dramatic reading each day. Very festive.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Stop buying those gross advent calendars you find in the grocery store and get this instead!!! Each chocolate is wrapped like a little present and taste so good. No chalky cheap chocolate here! Very nice quality chocolate that my picky teenage son actually ate and didn’t want to share!
customer_reviews.author: Camille B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate what high quality and delicious. The calendar was lovely and the sentiments written on each door were a nice touch. Mine came in very bent and it was hard to get the chocolate out. So, five stars for flavor but only four stars for presentation as it was damaged in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great value and attractive too
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved these. They liked the way the candies were presented! They loved the taste! And these calendars were not not any more expensive than others I’ve bought for them in the past. Since three of my grandchildren live in the Midwest, having Amazon deliver was much cheaper than me paying postage.
customer_reviews.author: L. H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Advent Calender
customer_reviews.text: I just got this calendar and my (5 yr old) daughter and I love it. I wasn't expecting the chocolate to be great, especially because I am pretty picky when it comes to chocolate, but it's actually really good! I was pleasantly surprised by how good it tastes. The individually wrapped chocolates are so cute, with shiny wrappers that look like little presents. All chocolates were in place. I kind of wish I'd have ordered 2! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Not for the chocolate connoisseur
customer_reviews.text: The quality of chocolate was very disappointing. For the price I expected a high end quality, but got a dollar store one instead. The reviews were very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: aschiede

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Product; Great for Countdown to Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love an Advent Calendar, and this is one of their favorites. Nice, similar, milk chocolates in various gift-like packages(our children save the wrappings to use in their little doll houses, e.g., Calico Critters) are hidden each day with a cute rhyme preparing you for Christmas. It's thin with a plastic back to hold the chocolates, but cute.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very simple Advent calendar but we enjoyed it. We were in the process of moving during Christmas so decorations were sparse. This item helped add some cheer and the kids enjoyed reading the parts of the poem on every "chocolate door".
customer_reviews.author: justin casteel

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY & FUN
customer_reviews.text: Fun trying to find the right number, and the chocolate was really good. Had some busy times so there were a couple left over and I had to beg to get to taste one. Very pleased. So much better than the cheap ones. Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: G'ma

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, didn't taste that good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandma as a Christmas present and she loves chocolate but couldn't even finish this. The packaging is cute, but if you are buying this for the taste then walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie.S

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivered!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun yummy way to count down to Christmas, my daughter really enjoys this calendar every holiday. Wal-Mart was sold out but amazon delivered!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So worth spending a little more and getting actual chocolate in one of these advent calendars. The ones I’ve bought for years are like eating chocolate flavored wax compared to this yummy-ness. Too bad my daughter won’t share.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute advent calendar for an affordable price. The chocolates are wrapped in colorful foil like little presents and each piece is a good size piece of solid chocolate. Behind each door is also a short narrative that builds into a larger story. Really great advent calendar! Huge hit with my 10yo son.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Advent Calendar for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Very good tasting chocolates. Bought this for my grandson. The first thing he does when he wakes up is go to the calendar and opens the day on it. He reads the poem and takes his chocolate gift and eats it. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Great! I'll never buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this advent calendar to my son who is a freshman in college, because I didn't want him to be without one......can't break tradition now! He got home yesterday and showed it to me, and he was singing its praises. I see why! The chocolates are sizable, and individually wrapped. Plus, each door has a little story written on it, too. How fun! WAYYY better than the $1.99 ones I've been buying at the local supermarket all these years. Going forward, this is the only one I'll buy! Sure it's a few bucks more, but it's so worth it! Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: coyofamily

customer_reviews.title: A Tasty Countdown
customer_reviews.text: The family loves a Advent calender, and this one offers good chocolates in cute wrappings. It's a toy shop with different toys and animals peering out the windows and doors. It's thin and lightweight, chocolates held in plastic slots behind the doors. Choose the number, open the door, read the clever little rhyme and push out the wrapped present from behind, eat chocolate. Our two young daughters and wife give the milk chocolates a big thumbs up. They save the wrappings for their doll houses for presents under their little trees.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Brought me back to my childhood
customer_reviews.text: Growing up we always had the advents with the chocolates in them. When i saw that Madellaine put this one out I was totally thrilled. I also worked in a candy store, and remembered it was a pretty good chocolate. It's sort of similar to Nestle. Overall my husband and I enjoyed the calendar. It even had cute little poems on the inside of all of the doors. I think the only little thing that detracted from it was that there were no pictures behind the chocolates. After you took the chocolates out, you would just see the plastic thing that it was sitting in. Sort of detracted from the overall look as we got later in the month.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Delicious candy!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids really liked this candy and it was beautifully wrapped. They were all the same with different wrappings, but my grandchildren did not seem to mind. Our candy pieces were in the right spots too.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Chocolate and Decent Size Pieces
customer_reviews.text: These cost a little more than most of the advent calendars I've bought in the past, but well worth it. Larger chunks of chocolate and according to my teenage kids (traditions never die), the chocolate is rather good. They said it's better than some of the cheapies I've bought a few times over the years because all local stores were out of the good stuff by the time I bought and of course, their taste in better chocolate improves with age. I'll definitely buy these again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged half the windows are open and the chocolate was shifted out of place. :(
customer_reviews.author: Marria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, individually wrapped chocolates in beautiful advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and room-mate for their dorm. They were thrilled and it helped them count the days of studying and finals until they came home for Christmas. The individually wrapped chocolates were fresh and yummy and the entire design was very charming. I'll order again for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The advent calendar itself was great, especially for the price. The chocolates tasted great and it was a fun daily activity for us. The only problem was that due to it being mailed to us in a bubble lined envelope, most of the doors were already had the perforation popped open. I just tucked them all back in, but it seemed like it could be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: lildebbiec

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates were delicious wrapped Like a little gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter, she usually gets the dollar store at advent calendars and was absolutely thrilled to get one with such great quality. Chocolates were delicious, each one wrapped like a little gift. Will do this again for her next year.
customer_reviews.author: Huntington Beach Mom

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Big Chunks of Deliciousness Every Year!
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's go-to advent calendar, as the chocolates inside are not only scrumptious; they are big cubes of awesomeness, each wrapped in different colors of foil wrappers like the true gifts that they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sakae

customer_reviews.title: Great value, fun and cute countdown.
customer_reviews.text: This advent calendar is a sweet way for counting down to Christmas. Each box has a separate little Christmas saying and the chocolates themselves are solid milk candies. Great value, and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Ciotti Household

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate- get it. The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost three and this is the first advent calendar. He loves the daily ritual, especially the chocolate. The chocolate is fantastic and a good size. The only downside for a 40 something parent is locating the number on the window cause they are so small and it's a real episode everyday passing it back and forth with my spouse trying to find it lol
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and good chocolate. The only reason I took on star is because a lot of the chocolates were hard to removed and a few doors were already opened....guessing bc of poor packaging choice.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice calendar! The chocolate is decent, and the design for keeping each chocolate in their own window works really well! They don't slide to the bottom of the calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: For YEARS I've been looking for a chocolate advent calendar that I had remembered from my childhood. It had little wrapped chocolate gifts and it tasted AMAZING. I believe that THIS was indeed the calendar from my childhood because the gifts and chocolate are exactly the same, just the calendar looks a bit different. So happy to have found this brand again! Chocolate is wrapped up and protected from absorbing any nasty plastic taste like some advent calendars have! And each window you open has a cute little story line to it! Will definitely be getting this every Christmas going forward!
customer_reviews.author: Kittylover9399

customer_reviews.title: Great Chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: Great Advent calendar... my kids loved it. Better than the other’s we’ve tried because the chocolates are nice, thick squares of good quality chocolate and are each wrapped to resemble little Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burchill

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Best chocolate advent calendar I’ve ever had. The chocolates are very good and the little quotes each day are adorable. I purchased two of them. Will certainly be getting this yearly
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: I love this calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar? Advent has just started, so I haven't opened up all the doors, but I love what I see so far. The calendar is cardboard but solid, and the chocolate behind the doors is all wrapped up like a little gift. And its a nice solid piece of good chocolate--a nice thick square. Plus the calendar is so pretty. I highly recommend it for Advent lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Cardello

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate was delicious. Amazon usually packs things in large boxes when they don’t need to be and this was sent in an envelope and got a bit smushed. But all candy was the same so it wasn’t like a partially opened door ruined a surprise so overall not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value but squares hard to open
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate was good quality and individual wrapped in each square. Slightly hard to open the squares. Beware it doesn’t have a 25th chocolate like most advent calendars.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Chase

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, just 25 of the same plane Chuck of chocolates. Would actually be better if they were smaller. Would Definitely be better if there was a variety. Kids stopped eating them after the 15th. If you are looking for something like this, just buy the $3 ones from Walmart. I was disappointed because my kids are getting older, thought I would get a nicer one because it's one of the years for them...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sanyang

customer_reviews.title: Came with half the windows already opened
customer_reviews.text: I get these every year for my son. This year’s came with half the windows already popped open, but it was still wrapped in plastic. He was upset but is old enough and got over it. I would think a younger child might not be so forgiving. Chocolate tastes fine though.
customer_reviews.author: sf24

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it but...
customer_reviews.text: I got this calendar along with another one from the same manufacturer this past Christmas for my daughters. This particular calendar had the same shaped chocolate in all the "windows", whereas the other one had different ones which was more exciting. This is the reason for 4 stars and not 5. Here is the link for the other calendar:  The chocolate is a good quality one. I would recommend this calendar if you don't mind the lack of variety.
customer_reviews.author: Anne 944

customer_reviews.title: Bad Chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Last years was decent but this year, all of the chocolates are bad! So my kids are opening every day and every day they have to throw the chocolates away because they are inedible! You know, when chocolate is covered in white and too hard to bite into! Will definitely now buy again next year!
customer_reviews.author: e.a.dog

customer_reviews.title: Rotten/Old Chocolates
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been so disappointed with this calendar. I bought 2 of them for my kids and both of them have chocolates that look rotten. Out of the 16 that we’ve opened more than half look like they are no good and we had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davis

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these! They both love that the chocolates are wrapped like little gifts. The pieces of chocolate are a nice size, not too small but not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan Ware

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The chocolates are individually wrapped and packaged in such a way that they are snug and do not jumble around or fall down. And the chocolate wasn't bad at all! Very tasty, in my opinion. There's small messages and poems on the inside of each door you open -- my only wish was that they were excerpts from a specific Christmas story/poem/song/etc. but they are still cute Christmas messages none the least! I definitely recommend this advent calendar -- I will be purchasing another 'Madelaine Chocolates' advent calendar next year :)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Fun little advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: The kiddos liked opening the calendar every day, and they didn’t complain about the chocolates. I wanted to try one but was never given a chance!
customer_reviews.author: Alpha G

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate taste!!
customer_reviews.text: My children loved the whole idea of the Advent Calendar during their childhood and wanted to pass it down to their kids. However, few stores sell Advent Calendar's anymore and if they do, the chocolate is waxy and small. This Calendar featured large chocolates each foil wrapped to look like a gift. I'll get it next year too!
customer_reviews.author: Pastorina

customer_reviews.title: Cute, great quality, sweet poems, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Advent Calendar! Chocolates taste delicious! Good quality and Great Value for your money. Each day has a cute little Christmas poem.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Andrews

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas Tradition - Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We have been sharing Advent Calendars with my children since before they were old enough to talk. To continue the tradition now that my daughter is away at college, we sent her this to count down the days to Christmas (and when she is coming home for break). She told us this was a wonderful surprise, enjoying reading the verse and getting a bit of good tasting chocolate before heading off to class. Glad this was available and very pleased that it made my daughter happy! Highly Recommended! CFH
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: What a great advent calendar. The chocolate was wonderful. Some of the windows were harder to open but I think that was a part of the fun with the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: T Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very average chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent house for an Advent calendar. However, the doors are a it hard to open and don't stay open. More importantly - the chocolate is very waxy - it's a very hard chocolate with an apparently large percentage of paraffin wax.
customer_reviews.author: Brocktoon The Great

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of packaging...may kill the surprise
customer_reviews.text: We bought two and they look good but sadly they arrived in a padded enveloppe and they were crushed with many doors already open. Did not taste them yet but first impression was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Patsss

customer_reviews.title: It's fun
customer_reviews.text: It's only 1 candy per day, so buy 2 or more if you have extra kids. The chocolate is tasty, a little hard to bite into so if you have delicate teeth beware. There are cute little sayings on each day. A nice tradition for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Sulander

customer_reviews.title: Cute and tasty!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The chocolate was very good and my grandchildren loved opening the doors each day!! I would definitely purchase again next year.!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates taste pretty good compared to other advent calendars. My toddler enjoyed opening the doors each day and hearing me read the little message. She looked forward to it each day. Will get this brand again next year.
customer_reviews.author: redhaired scandinavian

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can be used for children and adults. The artwork is very cute and pleasing. We've only tasted 2 chocolates as it is only Dec 2nd but what we tasted was delicious and the pieces are generous.
customer_reviews.author: Stella2065

customer_reviews.title: Best Chocolate Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best chocolate & I order every year for my kids. My daughter is 24 & son is 16 both would be hurt if they did not receive the best chocolate in an Advent calendar at Christmas 🎄
customer_reviews.author: Lindaann

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable Advent calendar for the kiddos. My daughter has been opening windows since Dec 1st, and she can’t wair for each day to come. The chocolate is delicious! I wish I could open a few windows myself. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this advent calendar. The chocolate is delicious and the pieces are bigger than what you'd get from a grocery store advent calendar. The doors are also easier to open and less frustrating than other calendars we've had. There are several different wrapper colors and she loves seeing which she'll get that day. Each day also has a cute poem she enjoys reading. I was skeptical of the price but the quality & quantity of the chocolate combined with the nice design and cute poems makes it worth it. I'll definitely be getting this calendar again next year.
customer_reviews.author: J and G

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids and delicious chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite chocolate advent calendar, we purchased one every year. The individually wrapped chocolates look like presents wrapped in foil wrapping paper. They are fun and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Chocolate and Great Sayings
customer_reviews.text: This Madelaine Chocolate Company Chocolate Advent calendar is perfect! My children love the different sayings behind the doors and the chocolate is very tasty. The chocolate gifts are a bit hard to remove from their trays but that is just fine since it helps them stay in place until they are to be taken out.
customer_reviews.author: La Madre de Isa

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate was very good the kids had a ton of fun getting to open the little door every day. Very nice advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: SageeTheMage

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. She has been wanting one for so long. I’m glad I got this one. The chocolate was really good!

customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.text: All around not worth the money. You can get a better product for less. This is way to expensive for what you receive. Don't bother wasting your money.

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar!

customer_reviews.author: VSchmidt713

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: BEST Advent Calendar Ever and the candy was amazing. Have purchased from other companies over the years but this this is the BEST EVER .. and they little messages inside were an extra treat for our 6 year old. These would make good gifts for the elderly as well.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. The chocolates are actually big, chunky pieces. The chocolate tastes delicious. Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Cardboard is rather flimsy, but the chocolate is high quality. The kids look forward to opening a door every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully done and the chocolate is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate was amazing my grandson loved every single moment of doing this calendar we will definitely do it every year from now on through this company worth the money
customer_reviews.author: vikki Hatfield szatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and fun to open daily. The chocolate was wrapped in a nice foil. My kiddo looked forward to this daily.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bruck

customer_reviews.title: The children love it
customer_reviews.text: Each chocolate is individually wrapped but they enjoy reading the part of the story behind each door before eating the chocolate. They look forward to opening each new door and have the next six doors picked out. I will look for this brand next year and continue the tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed the chocolate in the calendar this year, it is a milk chocolate and it doesn't taste like your average cheap chocolate. My only two complaints would be that the numbers for the different days are small and hard to locate on some of the windows and a few of the says inside the windows are odd and random. For the price, it is a pretty good calendar for counting down until Christmas, but if you are looking for meaning in the sayings.. maybe if you have kids or something.. you might want to consider another calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loved this and the chocolate was great! I will definitely make this a tradition to count down days until Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kdots

customer_reviews.title: Fun tradition for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I wanted to start a tradition with a chocolate Advent Calendar with our son, who is 3 years old. The calendar came just in time to start it on December 1st (Thanks, Amazon Prime!). It is really cute, an my son loves opening the doors/windows and unwrap the little chocolates in the gift wrapped foil. The reason that this is a 4 star review vs a 5 star is that the chocolates are pretty hard. We all had a little trouble biting into them. They are yummy, and it is something fun to do with our son.
customer_reviews.author: John Bayer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't end up eating many of them because they're VERY sweet and VERY hard on my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I was going to get an advent calendar with festive shaped chocolates, but this calendar has chocolate blocks wrapped in festive wrappers. I didn't end up eating many of them because they're VERY sweet and VERY hard on my teeth, and half of the windows were already popped open.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Okay for children
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate is the same in each window, it is an advent calendar. My eleven year old lived in Germany for 3 years and each year we had a Milka calendar which had a variety of chocolates. We just won't pay for that now that we are back in the US, this made a reasonable substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolates are good! Obviously not the highest end chocolate but hey better than any of the $1 ones I got at Trader Joe’s. Also these chocolate are much larger than I thought, thick, and wrapped in foil like presents.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be from last year. Hard, dry, brittle chocolate. From now on I order chocolate calendars directly from the chocolate company.
customer_reviews.author: kstorlie

customer_reviews.title: High quality chocolate. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this the chocolate was really good and the tiny present wrappers were a nice touch. Really nice calender!
customer_reviews.author: Acrowson85

customer_reviews.title: Best Advent Chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: Super yummy chocolate for any chocolate lover! Way better than the grocery store advent calendars! They are individually wrapped like presents and very generously sized! You only need one a day of these sweet treats!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: A great buy for the price. A nice little chunk of chocolate behind every door. Had so much more chocolate then pricier calendars. Look at the weight and you will see. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: De León

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it but windows open too easily and chocolates rolls out and have to put it back...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Treasure Hunt
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a couple of these in the past two years. I love them. I plan to purchase them every year. The hunt for the proper door, the cute little quips, and the chocolate! The chocolate has a divinely smooth texture and isn't too sweet. We look forward to this every day during Advent! They should make spring, summer, and fall editions.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Arthur Poe

customer_reviews.title: I was satisfied, and so were the kids
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy an advent calendar with chocolate inside for the kids, but didn't want those cheap ones with waxy, nasty chocolate nibs that you find at the grocery store. This one was fun with the little rhymes inside, especially for my 6 year old who can just read them. The boys thought the chocolate was great. It would be more fun if the chocolate came in different shapes, but we were fine with what we got. I liked that I could recycle the paper and the plastic of the packaging when done. Overall, it was fun, and worth the experience.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Big yummy. chocolate 🍫
customer_reviews.text: I liked the chocolate-they’re bigger than most advent calendars 📆-& they’re tasty 😋. Cute. Glad I got this one-out of all the pre-calendars.
customer_reviews.author: Sol Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I loved how the candies inside were wrapped like presents!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Slow delivery for mediocre chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Took almost 2 full weeks to get with prime. Ordered November 30th didn't receive until December 11th. The chocolate was incredibly and definitely not worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Finally, an Advent calendar with tasty chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates taste much better than the cheap ones in stores. Each day has a little message on it. Add some additional fun to christmas season.
